sections.description: Auto-updating version of the WP Atomic Design Framework plugin.
sections.changelog: Front‑end: menu status dot (before label) with settings toggle and deep submenu inheritance. Admin: Custom Features tab with Breadcrumbs — options for Home label or SVG icon, separator, show current page, max depth, container class, custom CSS editor, preview. Shortcode [adf_breadcrumbs] and block pattern registered.
